attention3.ptxt: For identification of each cylinder and bank, refer to Precaution for Identification of Cylinder and Bank:N32A .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0130: O2 Sensor Circuit Bank 1 Sensor 1

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of following conditions is met at bank 1.

item.ptxt: Variation of HO2S-1 signal is higher than 2 V when HO2S-1 heater is turned from ON to OFF.
Even if HO2S-2 signal voltage is lean state, HO2S-1 signal voltage is unchanged from rich state for 10 sec.
Even if HO2S-2 signal voltage is rich state, HO2S-1 signal voltage is unchanged from lean state for 5 sec.

ptxt.emph: P0150: O2 Sensor Circuit Bank 2 Sensor 1

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met at bank 2.

item.ptxt: Variation of HO2S-1 signal is higher than 2 V when HO2S-1 heater is turned from ON to OFF.
Even if HO2S-2 signal voltage is lean state, HO2S-1 signal voltage is unchanged from rich state for 10 sec.
Even if HO2S-2 signal voltage is rich state, HO2S-1 signal voltage is unchanged from lean state for 5 sec.

attention3.ptxt: Check to make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Run engine at idle speed for 5 min.
Drive vehicle at 60 – 80 km/h (37 – 50 mile/h) for 3 min. (Keep throttle valve opening constant in this step.)

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Description:N32A .

testgroup.title: HO2S, HO2S heater, HO2S circuit and HO2S heater circuit check

test1.ptxt: For bank related to DTC, Check the following items.

item.ptxt: HO2S circuit: Step 3 under DTC P0132 / P0137 / P0138 / P0152 / P0157 / P0158:N32A .
HO2S heater circuit: Step 2 through 3 under DTC P0030 / P0031 / P0032 / P0036 / P0037 / P0038 / P0050 / P0051 / P0052 / P0056 / P0057 / P0058:N32A

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Replace HO2S-1 of bank related to DTC.
Perform DTC confirmation procedure, and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P0130 or P0150 still detected?

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Replace HO2S-2 of bank related to DTC.
Perform DTC confirmation procedure, and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P0130 or P0150 still detected?

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
